partnerAggregatorBase.mainSelect:
select c.row_id -- 8000000000 + 4260000, --0 --b.customer_cd_target, --1 ,z.oldkey ,decode(c.tipologia,'REFERENTE CONTABILE', 'ZBUP02', 'REFERENTE CONTRATTUALE', 'ZBUP01', 'BUP001'), --2 c.x_cognome, --3 c.x_nome, --4 v.indccom, --5 v.inddcom, --6 v.indindi, --7 v.indindi||' '||v.indccvia,--8 substr(indcivi,0,10), --9 v.indest, --10 v.indcap, --11 decode(indnazi,'ITALIA','IT','SAN MARINO','SM','IT'), --12 v.indregio, --13 case when length(c.num_tel_work) > 6 then c.num_tel_work when length(c.num_tel_cell) = 10 then c.num_tel_cell else ' ' end case, --14 c.email_addr, --15 v.indprov, --16 v.indprog, --17 substr(x_cognome,0,20), --18 decode(c.tipologia,'REFERENTE CONTABILE', 'ZUR010', 'REFERENTE CONTRATTUALE', 'ZUR009', 'BUR001') --19
from dbi_user.ifc_sap_crm_contatti c left outer join dbi_user.ifc_sap_customer_rename b on c.id_cliente = b.customer_cd_source, v_indirizzi v, z_temksv z where tipologia is not null and c.indirizzo = v.indprog and b.customer_cd_target is not null --and (k.surrogate_key - 8000000000 + 4260000) < 4999999 and c.tipologia in ('REFERENTE CONTRATTUALE', 'REFERENTE CONTABILE') and (c.id_cliente = z.oldkey and z.object = 'PARTNER') union select c.row_id -- 8000000000 + 4260000, --0 --b.customer_cd_target, --1 ,z.oldkey ,decode(c.tipologia,'REFERENTE CONTABILE', 'ZBUP02', 'REFERENTE CONTRATTUALE', 'ZBUP01', 'BUP001'), --2 c.x_cognome, --3 c.x_nome, --4 v.indccom, --5 v.inddcom, --6 v.indindi, --7 v.indindi||' '||v.indccvia,--8 substr(indcivi,0,10), --9 v.indest, --10 v.indcap, --11 decode(indnazi,'ITALIA','IT','SAN MARINO','SM','IT'), --12 v.indregio, --13 case when length(c.num_tel_work) > 6 then c.num_tel_work when length(c.num_tel_cell) = 10 then c.num_tel_cell else ' ' end case, --14 c.email_addr, --15 v.indprov, --16 v.indprog, --17 substr(x_cognome,0,20), --18 decode(c.tipologia,'REFERENTE CONTABILE', 'ZUR010', 'REFERENTE CONTRATTUALE', 'ZUR009', 'BUR001') --19
from dbi_user.ifc_sap_crm_contatti c left outer join dbi_user.ifc_sap_customer_rename b on c.id_cliente = b.customer_cd_source, v_indirizzi v, z_temksv z where tipologia is not null and c.indirizzo = v.indprog and b.customer_cd_target is not null --and (k.surrogate_key - 8000000000 + 4260000) < 4999999 and c.tipologia not in ('REFERENTE CONTRATTUALE', 'REFERENTE CONTABILE') and (c.id_cliente = z.oldkey and z.object = 'PARTNER') order by 1

partnerRefExtractor.mainSelect: select a.legacy, -- 0 INIT a.legacy||c.adext_addr, -- 1 a.legacy||c.adext_addr, -- 2 ' ', -- 3 ' ', -- 4 a.legacy, -- 5 a.tipo, -- 6 a.partner, -- 7 a.muster_kun, -- 8 a.bu_rltyp, -- 9 a.bu_type, -- 10 a.bpkind, -- 11 b.legacy, -- 12 BUT000 b.tipo, -- 13 b.bu_sort1, -- 14 b.bu_sort2, -- 15 b.title, -- 16 b.name_org1, -- 17 b.name_org2, -- 18 b.name_org3, -- 19 b.name_org4, -- 20 b.legal_enty, -- 21 b.name_last, -- 22 b.name_first, -- 23 b.partgrptyp, -- 24 b.name_grp1, -- 25 b.name_grp2, -- 26 ' ', -- 27 ' ', -- 28 ' ', -- 29 b.zzfactor, -- 30 b.zzstato, -- 31 b.zzaedat, -- 32 b.zzpool, -- 33 b.zzwaers, -- 34 replace(to_char(b.zzfattu,'99999999990D99'),'.',','), -- 35 replace(to_char(b.zzplafond_ric,'99999999990D99'),'.',','), -- 36 replace(to_char(b.zzplafond,'99999999990D99'),'.',','), -- 37 replace(to_char(b.zzprotest,'99999999990D99'),'.',','), -- 38 replace(to_char(b.zzpregiud,'99999999990D99'),'.',','), -- 39 b.zzrating, -- 40 b.zzdtcost, -- 41 b.zzvalid, -- 42 b.zzcrmdt, -- 43 b.zzcrmcc, -- 44 b.zzmahns_gas, -- 45 b.zzmahns_pow, -- 46 b.zzmahns_fot, -- 47 b.zzcesdt, -- 48 b.zzfldis1, -- 49 b.zzsegcli, -- 50 b.zzsegcred, -- 51 c.legacy, -- 52 BUT020 c.tipo, -- 53 c.adext_addr, -- 54 c.city1, -- 55 c.post_code1, -- 56 c.street, -- 57 c.house_num1, -- 58 c.country, -- 59 c.region, -- 60 c.tel_number, -- 61 m.legacy, -- 62 BUTCOM m.tipo, -- 63 m.icom_tel_number, -- 64 m.icom_smtp_addr -- 65 from partner_ref_init a, partner_ref_but000 b, partner_ref_but020 c, partner_ref_butcom m where a.legacy = b.legacy and a.legacy = c.legacy and a.legacy = m.legacy order by a.legacy, a.legacy||c.adext_addr, a.legacy||c.adext_addr

partnerRelExtractor.mainSelect: select * from PART_REL_INIT order by legacy
